channel.title: [PI] Vote4Cash every hour problen
channel.description:
Hey I need help.. You can only vote every 24th hour on my Vote4Cash. Like if I type in my name, then it says. Sorry you have already voted once today. The problem is that I host my server on moparscape serverstatus, so I need to set it to every hour.
Before you say or ask: Yes, I am on Define_hours 1

item.title: [PI] Vote4Cash every hour problen
item.dc:creator: @matiasmunk matiasmunk
item.description:
@matiasmunk wrote:

Can’t you read? I already set Define_hours to 1 -.-.-.-.-…-

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Vote4Cash every hour problen
item.dc:creator: @Meeper98 Meeper98
item.description:
@Meeper98 wrote:

in your vote.php, there should be all ur db shit like username; db host; password; then the link; after the link you should see VOTE_HOURS set to 1…

Read full topic
